Package high.mackenzie.autumn.lang.compiler.compilers

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ICompiler
    An instance of this interface controls the compilation of part of an Autumn program.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractAstVisitor
    This class provides a partial implementation of the IAstVisitor interface.
    CollectionCompiler<T>
    This class generates bytecode that creates a linked-list with predefined elements.
    DesignCompiler
    An instance of this class controls the compilation of a design-definition.
    ExpressionCodeGenerator
    An instance of this class performs the bytecode generation related to an expression.
    ExpressionTypeChecker
    An instance of this class can perform type usage checking on an expression.
    FunctionCompiler
    An instance of this class controls the compilation of a function-definition.
    FunctorCompiler
    An instance of this class controls the compilation of a functor-definition.
    Importer
    Essentially, an instance of this class implements import-directives.
    KlassCompiler
    An instance of this class generates the bytecode representation of a class that provides a prototypical implementation of an design-type.
    LabelScope
    An instance of this class controls the allocation of location labels.
    ModuleCompiler
    An instance of this class controls the compilation of an entire module.
    ProgramCompiler
    An instance of this class controls the compilation of an entire program.
    StatementCodeGenerator
    An instance of this class can generate the bytecode that implements a statement.
    StatementTypeChecker
    An instance of this class performs type usage checking on a statement.
    StaticChecker
    An instance of this class provides methods which check for and report static type errors.
    SymbolTable
    An instance of this class provides a place to store information needed during compilation.
    TupleCompiler
    An instance of this class is a compiler that compiles a tuple-definition.
    TypeSystem
    An instance of this class is the type-system in use by a compiler.
    VariableManipulator
    An instance of this class is used to generate bytecode that manipulates local-variables.
    VariableScope
    An instance of this class provides the logic necessary to allocate local variables.
